items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t understand how to use a computer.
I bought a camera, but I lost it the next day.
I don\'t think it\'ll be difficult to do that.
I don\'t think that\'ll happen until tomorrow.
Metaphors aren\'t meant to be taken literally.
Her new husband turned out to be a bad person.
Tom doesn\'t like working the graveyard shift.
Tom\'s been playing computer games since noon.
Tom\'s lunch includes a sandwich and an apple.
Tom should take advantage of this opportunity.
